name: Dive Bar
social_dynamics: Regulars at the bar, low expectations, easy conversation with strangers, jukebox selections
cultural_notes: Working class origins, now beloved by all. The great equalizer of drinking establishments. Usually has a colorful history and regular characters.

name: Irish Pub
social_dynamics: Communal tables, conversation flows easily, often live traditional music, strangers become friends
cultural_notes: A home away from home. Irish pubs worldwide follow certain design principles but each has unique character. Central to Irish social life.

name: Hi-Fi Listening Bar
social_dynamics: Quiet conversation, music is the priority, people face the speakers, records are handled with care
cultural_notes: Inspired by Japanese jazz kissa culture. The music selection and sound system are as important as the drinks. A place to listen, not just drink.

name: Cigar Lounge
social_dynamics: Business discussions, leisurely conversations, shared appreciation of cigars, slower pace
cultural_notes: A space for lingering. Cigar culture emphasizes taking time, enjoying craftsmanship, and conversation. Often attached to hotels or tobacco shops.

name: Barcade
social_dynamics: Friendly competition, groups playing games, quarters on the machines, high scores bragged about
cultural_notes: The perfect blend of nostalgia and nightlife. Classic arcade games meet modern craft beer. Popular for dates and group outings.

name: Sports Bar
social_dynamics: Game-day energy, strangers high-fiving, focused on screens during plays, lively during timeouts
cultural_notes: The modern town square for sports fans. Multiple screens showing different games, loyalty to local teams, big game days are electric.

name: Latin Bar & Kitchen
social_dynamics: Dancing breaks out, groups celebrating, food and drinks flow together, lively conversations
cultural_notes: Where Latin American hospitality shines. Often transforms from restaurant to dance space as night progresses. Family-like atmosphere.

name: Indian / Telugu Sports Bar
social_dynamics: Cricket matches create collective euphoria, multiple generations together, food is central
cultural_notes: A unique hybrid found in Telugu communities. During cricket matches, especially India/Pakistan games, the energy is unmatched. Family dining by day, intense sports viewing during matches.
